pages.text: Direwolves wander the cold landscapes of the Overworld. If TFC is installed, you can find Direwolves in the same areas as TFC Direwolves. $(br2)Direwolves can be tamed much like wolves and be ridden without a saddle. $(br2)When tamed and in wander mode, they will hunt other animals. $(br2)Direwolves aren't strong enough to jump with a player on their back, unlike horses or quaggas.

When tamed, they can carry their owner. They can be sat down/ up by shift-left-clicking them, and put to Follow/ Wander mode by shift-right-clicking.  $(br2)Be careful, as they'll attack players on-sight. Tame them as fast as possible! $(br2)Direwolves enjoy Raw Meat and Bones.
